WELCOME.CONTENTS_2: ! 您现在可以访问并查询您的健康信息

HEALTH_TOPICS.TITLE: 健康主题
HEALTH_TOPICS.CONTENTS: 把别人的经验变成自己的, 他的本事就大了。

VETERANS_HEALTH_ADMINISTRATION_WEBSITE.TITLE: 老兵健康信息管理网站
VETERANS_HEALTH_ADMINISTRATION_WEBSITE.CONTENTS: 敌人有的，我们要有，敌人没有的，我们也要有。原子弹要有，氢弹也要快。管他什么国，管他什么弹，原子弹、氢弹，我们都要超过。

VIDEOS_AND_TOOLS.TITLE: 视频与工具
VIDEOS_AND_TOOLS.CONTENTS: 革命不是请客吃饭，不是做文章，不是绘画绣花，不能那样雅致，那样从容不迫，文质彬彬，那样温良恭俭让。革命就是暴动，是一个阶级推翻一个阶级的暴烈的行动。

MEDICAL_ENCYCLOPEDIA.TITLE: 医学百科全书
MEDICAL_ENCYCLOPEDIA.CONTENTS: The Medline Plus medical encyclopedia includes more than 4,000 articles about diseases,tests, symptoms, injuries, and surgeries.

NIH_SENIOR_HEALTH.TITLE: NIH高级健康信息
NIH_SENIOR_HEALTH.CONTENTS: An NIH website designed to meet the needs of older adults. Seniors and caregivers can find information on selected topics in an easy-to-read format.

WOMEN_HEALTH_RESOURCE.TITLE: 女子健康资源
WOMEN_HEALTH_RESOURCE.CONTENTS: An NIH website that provides a wealth of women’s health information, including substance abuse, autoimmune diseases, bone and joint health, cancer, exercise and fitness, heart disease, menopausal hormone therapy, reproductive health, violence against women, and more.

POPULATION_SPECIFIC_HEALTH_INFORMATION.TITLE: 公共健康信息
POPULATION_SPECIFIC_HEALTH_INFORMATION.CONTENTS: An NIH website that provides health-related information for population groups, including children, adolescents, women, seniors, Gulf War Veterans, numerous ethnicities, and more.

FIND_A_DOCTOR.TITLE: 查询医生
FIND_A_DOCTOR.CONTENTS: An NIH website with resources for individuals trying to find a doctor or information about a doctor.

EVALUATING_INTERNET_HEALTH_INFORMATION.TITLE: 分析网络医学信息
EVALUATING_INTERNET_HEALTH_INFORMATION.CONTENTS: This tutorial from the National Library of Medicine teaches you how to evaluate the health information that you find on the internet.

PRESCRIPTION.TITLE: Prescription and Over-the-Counter Medications
PRESCRIPTION.OPTIONS_1_CONTENTS: This NIH website provides information about prescription medications, over-the-counter medicines, herbs, and supplements. Includes information on side effects, dosage, special precautions, and more.
PRESCRIPTION.OPTIONS_2_CONTENTS: An NIH website that provides quick access to high quality drug information.
PRESCRIPTION.OPTIONS_3_CONTENTS: This NIH website contains more than 75,000 FDA-approved medication labels that are included in drug packages.
PRESCRIPTION.OPTIONS_4_CONTENTS: This NIH website contains the full label contents from dietary supplement products marketed in the United States.

MENTAL_HEALTH_AND_SUBSTANCE_ABUSE.TITLE: 精神健康及药物滥用
MENTAL_HEALTH_AND_SUBSTANCE_ABUSE.OPTIONS_1_CONTENTS: The SAMHSA Store provides thousands of brochures, guides, monographs, and other publications on a wide variety of topics related to substance abuse and mental health treatment, prevention, and recovery.
MENTAL_HEALTH_AND_SUBSTANCE_ABUSE.OPTIONS_2_CONTENTS: This Department of Health & Human Services website provides information about mental health, mental illness, treatment, recovery, and resources.
MENTAL_HEALTH_AND_SUBSTANCE_ABUSE.OPTIONS_3: National Alliance on Mental Illness Website
MENTAL_HEALTH_AND_SUBSTANCE_ABUSE.OPTIONS_3_CONTENTS: The National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI) website provides educational information on most mental illness disorders as well as resources for people with mental illness and their families.

SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_2: 没有账号? 开始注册!
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_4: 账号, 请联系你的医生并申请一个
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_9: 风雨送春归，飞雪迎春到。已是悬崖百丈冰，犹有花枝俏。俏也不争春，只把春来报。待到山花烂漫时，她在丛中笑。
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_14: 驿外断桥边，寂寞开无主。已是黄昏独自愁，更著风和雨。无意苦争春，一任群芳妒。零落成泥辗作尘，只有香如故。
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_17: The term HIE is an abbreviation for electronic health record (HIE). Your HIE is a digital or electronic version of your health record. An HIE is a real-time, patient-centered electronic health record that makes your health information instantly available to you and authorized users.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_19: What are the benefits of a
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_20: allow patients and health care providers to communicate and share health information online, as a supplement to face-to-face office visits. They can help you to view your health information and test results. There are many more benefits, described on the How Can Consent2Share Help Me? page
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_22: This brief presentation will demonstrate how to log in and navigate through your
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_23: account, view your health records, manage your prescriptions, add health information, review reminders, access health education materials, and more.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_27: as a very helpful tool. It can help put you in charge of your own health information. It will help you quickly find your health information-from all of your health care providers-in one place! Not only can you view and print your health information, you can add information, communicate with your providers, manage your prescriptions, and many more actions, described below.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_29: One of the most obvious and powerful ways you can use
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_30: is to view your health records from all of your providers in a single location. Also,
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_31: organizes your health information in ways that are meaningful and useful to you. It will help you better understand your health information, help you to be better informed. and help you to be more involved in your health care.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_34: account can help you to do many things:
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_36: Not only can you view your health information, you can add to it. For example, if you monitor certain health activities, such as monitoring your blood glucose levels, you can use
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_37: to store your blood glucose levels. If you collect data using medical and health apps, you can download your health data to your
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_38: account and share that information with your physician. You can use
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_39: to keep a health diary and document your medical symptoms.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_41: After a lab or other test, your physician may have explained the results to you. But you can use
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_42: to obtain a complete copy of the test results so that you can better understand it, share with your family, and share with other providers.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_44: As you view your health information, do you notice any inaccuracies? If so, you can use
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_45: to contact your health care provider and make your health information accurate.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_48: to get reminders about upcoming medical appointments, lab test appointments, prescription refills and other health-related events.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_49: Communicate, Make Appointments, and Manage Prescriptions:
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_50: to communicate electronically with your health care provider to ask questions or share information with your health care provider. You can view your upcoming health care appointments and make appointments. You can view your prescription medication history, view your current medication regime, and request refills of your medications from your provider.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_52: to obtain authoritative information about medical problems, prevention, treatments, and what you can do to manage your medical problems and improve your health.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_54: There may be times when your health care providers ask you to complete medical assessments or forms. You can use
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_55: to complete these forms online rather than using a paper version.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_58: account to view your billing and payment information and to make medical payments online.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_59: 我的信息保密并安全吗?
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_61: 人生易老天难老，岁岁重阳。今又重阳，战地黄花分外香。一年一度秋风劲，不似春光。胜似春光，廖廓江天万里霜。
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_63: Yes. Your EHR Portal protects your health information through password protection, data encryption, and other technical safeguards. Your EHR
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_64: meets very high health information technology standards regarding privacy, security, and protection. It also compiles with federal laws regarding health information.
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_65: How can I Keep my Health Information Safe?
SECURITY_LOGIN.CONTENTS_66: You can help to keep your information safe by using normal safe internet practices. For instance, use a strong password and update it often. Do not share your username or password with others. You should log on to the EHR Patient Portal only from a personal or secure computer and not a public computer.
